Name: Bagboo

1.Name: Swiftly Honed
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there is at least 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color> character in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color> DMG increases by 30%.

2.Desc:
